channel.title: Help! my server compiles but wont run help me for 500k rs cash
channel.description: IF ANY1 CAN TELL ME HOW TO DO IT I WILL GIVE THEM 500K RS CASH AND IF THEY SHOW ME HOW TO GET IT TO WORK GETS 2MILL RS CASH :)

item.title: Help! my server compiles but wont run help me for 500k rs cash
item.dc:creator: @rukki rukki
item.description:
@rukki wrote:

What’s in the run.bat?
Can you play on your server from your own computer?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2007, 11:44:17 AM[/size][hr]try to put this in your run.bat or runserver.bat:

@echo off
color 0b
title YOURSERVERNAME
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2007, 11:50:13 AM[/size][hr]set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” is the path to your java
-Xmx1024m the ram memory of your computer

Read full topic
item.source: Help! my server compiles but wont run help me for 500k rs cash
